long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Small tools to enhance everyday AWS Usage. Well, only 1 tool at the moment.

## Reload to default region

AWS sometimes randomly decides to open us-east-1 region when you login to an account. Or you may need to make a short trip to a different region and come back to your commonly used one. This tool aims to save those 8 seconds of going back to the region you usually work on (your _default region_).

2 ways to come back to your default region:
1. Use keyboard shortcut: `Alt+R`. Shortcut can be changed [here](chrome://extensions/shortcuts).
1. Click the extension icon > click __Reload__ button.
